definition: A period of time during which an individual takes a break from work or daily routine, typically for leisure, relaxation, or travel purposes. It is commonly used to refer to a vacation or holiday.

examples.german: Ich mache gerne Urlaub am Strand.
examples.english: I enjoy vacationing at the beach.

examples.german: Wir planen einen Urlaub in den Bergen.
examples.english: We are planning a vacation in the mountains.

examples.german: Mein letzter Urlaub war sehr entspannend.
examples.english: My last vacation was very relaxing.

examples.german: Wohin gehst du in diesem Jahr in den Urlaub?
examples.english: Where are you going on vacation this year?

examples.german: Ich habe zwei Wochen Urlaub im Sommer.
examples.english: I have two weeks of vacation in the summer.
